SKT_FIRST.name: Beware the Scissor Girl
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks an enemy and has a <color=#28d9ed>30%</color> chance to grant the caster increased <color=#28d9ed>Penetration</color> for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.\nDeals <color=#28d9ed>3%</color> of the target's Max Health as fixed damage if the target is inflicted with <color=#28d9ed>Bleeding</color>.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_jp: 敵単体にダメージを与え、<color=#28d9ed>30%</color>の確率で自分の<color=#28d9ed>貫通力</color>を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間UPさせる。\n対象が<color=#28d9ed>出血</color>状態の場合、対象の最大HPの<color=#28d9ed>3%</color>の固定ダメージを与える。
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_kr: 적을 공격하고 <color=#28d9ed>30%</color> 확률로 자신의 <color=#28d9ed>관통력</color>을 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 증가시킵니다.\n대상이 <color=#28d9ed>출혈</color> 상태라면 대상 최대 체력의 <color=#28d9ed>3%</color> 만큼 고정 피해를 입힙니다.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_zh: 攻击敌人,并有<color=#28d9ed>30%</color>的几率使自身<color=#28d9ed>穿透力</color>提升,持续<color=#28d9ed>2回合</color>。\n若目标处于<color=#28d9ed>出血</color>状态,则造成相当于目标生命值上限<color=#28d9ed>3%</color>的固定伤害。

SKT_SECOND.name: Surprise!
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: Attacks all enemies and has a <color=#28d9ed>60%</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Bleeding</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.\nIncreases damage dealt if the caster has increased <color=#28d9ed>Penetration</color>.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_jp: 敵全体にダメージを与え、対象に<color=#28d9ed>60%</color>の確率で<color=#28d9ed>出血</color>を<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>の間付与する。\n自分の<color=#28d9ed>貫通力</color>がUPした状態の場合、ダメージがUPする。
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_kr: 적 전체를 공격하고 대상에게 <color=#28d9ed>60%</color> 확률로 <color=#28d9ed>출혈</color>을 <color=#28d9ed>1턴</color> 동안 부여합니다.\n자신의 <color=#28d9ed>관통력</color>이 증가한 상태라면 피해가 증가합니다.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_zh: 攻击全体敌人,并有<color=#28d9ed>60%</color>的几率对目标造成<color=#28d9ed>出血</color>效果,持续<color=#28d9ed>1回合</color>。\n若自身的<color=#28d9ed>穿透力</color>效果处于提升状态,则使伤害提升。

SKT_BURST_1.effect: Adds 5% of the target's Max Health as fixed damage
SKT_BURST_1.effect_jp: 対象の最大HP5%の固定ダメージ追加
SKT_BURST_1.effect_kr: 대상 최대 체력 5%의 고정 피해 추가
SKT_BURST_1.effect_zh: 附加目标生命值上限5%的固定伤害

SKT_BURST_3.effect: Changed to Enhanced Skill\nIncreases the chance to activate buffs by 20%
SKT_BURST_3.effect_jp: 強化スキルに変更\nバフ発生率+20%
SKT_BURST_3.effect_zh: 转化为强化技能\n增益触发几率+20%

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: A Present for You!
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: Attacks an enemy.\nDeals significantly increased damage if the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Penetration</color> is currently increased. Deals <color=#28d9ed>5%</color> of the target's Max Health as fixed damage if the target is inflicted with <color=#28d9ed>Bleeding</color>. After using this skill, has a <color=#28d9ed>80%</color> chance to increase the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Penetration</color> for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color> and inflict <color=#28d9ed>Bleeding</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_jp: 敵単体にダメージを与える。自分の<color=#28d9ed>貫通力</color>がUPした状態の場合、ダメージが大幅にUPし、対象が<color=#28d9ed>出血</color>状態の場合、対象の最大HPの<color=#28d9ed>5%</color>の固定ダメージを与える。スキル使用後、<color=#28d9ed>80%</color>の確率で自分の<color=#28d9ed>貫通力</color>が<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間UPし、対象に<color=#28d9ed>出血</color>を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間付与する。
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_kr: 적을 공격합니다. 자신의 <color=#28d9ed>관통력</color>이 증가한 상태라면 피해가 크게 증가하고, 대상이 <color=#28d9ed>출혈</color> 상태라면 대상 최대 체력의 <color=#28d9ed>5%</color> 만큼 고정 피해를 입힙니다. 스킬 사용 후 <color=#28d9ed>80%</color> 확률로 자신의 <color=#28d9ed>관통력</color>이 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 증가하고, 대상에게 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 <color=#28d9ed>출혈</color>을 부여합니다.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_zh: 攻击敌人。若自身的<color=#28d9ed>穿透力</color>处于提升状态,则使伤害大幅提升,且若目标处于<color=#28d9ed>出血</color>状态,则造成相当于目标生命值上限<color=#28d9ed>5%</color>的固定伤害。使用技能后,有<color=#28d9ed>80%</color>的几率使自身的<color=#28d9ed>穿透力</color>提升,持续<color=#28d9ed>2回合</color>,并对目标造成<color=#28d9ed>出血</color>效果,持续<color=#28d9ed>2回合</color>。

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Starter Effect</color>: Increases the <color=#28d9ed>Penetration</color> of all characters participating in the Skill Chain by <color=#28d9ed>30%</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: Heals Health by <color=#28d9ed>20%</color> of damage dealt.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_jp: <color=#ffd732>チェーン効果(初手)</color>:このチェーンスキル参加者の<color=#28d9ed>貫通力</color>が<color=#28d9ed>30%</color>UPする。\n\n<color=#ffd732>連携効果</color>:与えたダメージの<color=#28d9ed>20%</color>を回復する。
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_kr: <color=#ffd732>체인 스타터 효과</color> : 해당 스킬 체인 참가자의 <color=#28d9ed>관통력</color>이 <color=#28d9ed>30%</color> 증가합니다.\n\n<color=#ffd732>협공 효과</color> : 입힌 피해의 <color=#28d9ed>20%</color>를 회복합니다.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_zh: <color=#ffd732>连携起始效果</color>:使该连携技能参与者的<color=#28d9ed>穿透力</color>提升<color=#28d9ed>30%</color>。\n\n<color=#ffd732>夹攻效果</color>:恢复造成伤害的<color=#28d9ed>20%</color>。

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
2_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
3: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
3_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
4: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
4_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
5: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
5_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
